question.title: Selenium Java WebDriver - How to fetch the URL of User's Home page after Successful login?
question.body:
I am new to the Selenium Tools and developing JEE9 application using JSF Pages. While writing the Integration Test in Java (after recording using Selenium IDE) - I could not figure out how can I fetch the User's Home page after the successful login: Below is my test code:

driver.get("http://localhost:8080/<app-name>/");
driver.manage().window().setSize(new Dimension(1850, 1053));
driver.findElement(By.linkText("Log In")).click();
driver.findElement(By.id("email")).sendKeys("<correct email>");
driver.findElement(By.id("password")).sendKeys("<correct password>");
driver.findElement(By.id("logInBtn")).click();

I the actual scenario on the Browser (and after the login success),the application redirects to User's home page:

http://localhost:8080/<app-name>/userHome.xhtml

My question is how can I simulate the same behaviour in my test case?

I have search the Internet in vain along with going through the WebDriver API.
